name: Cubic Conundrum
description:
Cubic Conundrum is a puzzle game prototype I created during the summer of 2016. In Cubic Conundrum you control a group of cubes in order to solve puzzles using their unique ability to attach to surfaces and to each other.

I showed the game off at Montreal International Games Summit 2016 aswell as the Montreal Independent Games Festival 2016.

Controls:
WASD: Move
E: To Attach to Surfaces/Other Cubes
C: Cycle through Current Selected Cube, Hold to choose specific color
